printer.gpio_pin: <NUMBER> GPIO pin to control printer (BCM numbering)
printer.control_pulse_length_s: <NUMBER> pulse length in seconds to control printer

poll_interval_s: <NUMBER> time in seconds between CUPS queue polling
wait_timeout_s: <NUMBER> time in seconds to wait for new jobs

webhook.url: <URL> on error, a GET request will be sent with the parameters below
